title: Excellent Pakistan Buffet
text: Came here with 8 adults and 8 kids and had an amazing lunch buffet. The quantity and quality of food options is daunting to digest. Best thing is the value of money considering the amount we paid (AED 700 which includes the tip) for 16 people. Highly recommend this place.

title: Reasonable price / facilities and good staff
text: My family and I spent 2 nights here during the weekend. The price is a good deal for a location near many attractions. Service was good and rooms were good sized. We used the sofa bed for the girls (9 and 7). Bathroom is also spacious and stocked with good hand soap and shower gel. Breakfast selection is very good and dinner buffet is reasonably priced.

title: Superb
text: This is an excellent resort - we came here to attend a wedding and visited their spa as well. Food was amazing and the service was great. Beach is beautiful and so peaceful. This is a dream destination and worth it!

title: Excellent
text: Super sushi! Their portions are large and taste is excellent. I came here after many years and would highly recommend it.

title: Review of TWA Hotel facilities (not the room)
text: This is a review of the TWA Hotel facilities where we visited the museum, aircraft bar and one of their cafes. Good to get a break from the airport chaos if you have a layover especially near Terminal 5 (for JetBlue flights).

title: JFK - PBI - JFK
text: We sat in the exit row seats (the two seaters near the exit row) - they were not as comfortable as my previous trips. Very good service and snacks.

title: Average Business Class (KWI - JFK - KWI)
text: My wife and I flew Kuwait Airways Business Class from Kuwait to JFK and back. Overall, service for Business Class is rather average. The crew were not very service oriented. Food was also very bland and nothing great. Seats were comfortable - highly recommend sitting in the middle of the cabin for easy access to the aisle. No amenity kits or PJs so make sure to bring your own comfortable clothing.

title: Salmiya Location
text: This is a review of their Salmiya Location - Food was amazing, cooked fresh and was customized to our requirements (we requested Medium Spicy and no added sugar). Service was quick. It's a small restaurant so catering for a large crowd may be difficult.

title: Great Syrian Food
text: The food here is absolutely amazing. Large family size platters served with rice, mixed grills and salads - it was mouth watering good. My only disappointment was their hummos which needed more Tahini and lemon (it tasted a little off). Service was also ok since they were super busy. Overall - highly recommended.

title: FLL to JFK
text: I was super impressed with JetBlue. The seats were very comfortable, free WiFi (pre, throughout and post flight), coffee, and snacks. It was all great!

title: Great service and portion sizes
text: We came here for a family dinner. Service was excellent and portion sizes were huge. We ordered the grilled salmon on the cedar planks along with sides of veggies and the crab dip. It was an amazing meal.

title: Excellent Kebabs - Horrendous Bathrooms
text: If you are looking for amazing Pakistani cuisine, then this is the place to go to. Only downer was that the bathrooms were horrible - they urgently need to be cared for on a daily basis.

title: Very good steaks - average burger
text: We came here since they serve halal steaks and burgers. The steaks were excellent but the burger was ok. My wife liked the salmon dish as well.

title: Tasty Egyptian Cuisine
text: We came here for lunch to celebrate my Aunt's birthday. The food was very good. I would recommend their mixed appetizer platter as well as their kebabs.

title: Great Kababs
text: I came here for dinner with the family and was blown away with their amazing kabab platters which had an authentic flavor (Afghani / Pakistani).

title: Great walk
text: If you are looking for a great walk around the Bloor and Younge street area I would highly recommend this place. Great vibe.

title: Beautiful
text: This little gem of a park is located in Oakville and is off of Lake Ontario. It is a gorgeous place and so peaceful out here.

title: Love it!
text: I came here with my kids and nephews. For those of you looking for a funny-poop themed venue then this is the place to go to. Their menu is hilarious and desserts tasted great.

title: Fresh and spicy
text: Had a lovely spicy fried chicken meal here with the kids. Service was friendly. I would highly recommend this place.

title: Dessert Heaven
text: I came here with my wife and kids and the desserts were huge and amazing. Highly recommended to satisfy that sweet tooth.

title: Great to eat here again after all these years!
text: We used to frequent this restaurant 11 years ago and returned. Food still tastes amazing and was very reasonable. Check out the chicken jhaalfrezi and bhoona gosht.

title: Tasty Lebanese
text: Had take out from Paramount Foods and enjoyed the quality of their foods. Definitely would recommend this place.

title: Amazing
text: Perhaps one of the best Lebanese meals I've had in North America. Food was absolutely amazing and large portion sizes. Service can be slow since the restaurant was very busy.

title: Horrendous
text: Check in was horrible - the staff looked disinterested and was focused on something else. The rooms looked absolutely dated, door looked damaged (as if someone tried to break it) and the bathroom was horrible. Luckily I was here for one night and couldn't wait to leave. Only benefit is that they are located very close to the rental car return.
place: Quality Inn & Suites Detroit Metro Airport

title: Superb
text: I was impressed with this restaurant. Food was tasty and super reasonable. Highly recommend this place.

title: Good rooms
text: A very basic Best Western motel. Rooms are large and beds are comfortable. However, all in all it is an average place. Check in experience was ok and check out was easy and quick. I did not try their complementary breakfast.

title: Decent experience
text: Flight was decent and seats were comfortable. Coffee and snacks were good as well. Overall pleasant experience.

title: Good service and entertaintment system
text: I was impressed with the in flight entertainment system and the coffee / snacks. Seats were very comfortable as well.

title: Too crowded
text: Visited the Times Square again after several months. It is way too crowded but is worth checking out.

title: Amazing place
text: This is a must-see attraction. Plan on spending at least 3 hours. Your kids will enjoy the museum exhibits.

title: Great experience
text: You can walk up to the top to get some great views of the Hudson yards. It is a great experience and there is an elevator for people who do not want to walk up the stairs.

title: New mall but expensive
text: This is a new mall but fairly expensive. It is located near the vessel which is a great tourist attraction.
place: The Shops & Restaurants at Hudson Yards

title: Great coffee - not so clean bathrooms
text: Came here for coffee and, as expected, coffee was great. Only complaint is that bathrooms are not the cleanest and require more attention.

title: Excellent
text: Had a lovely dinner here. Food is absolutely authentic and portion sizes are large and generous. Also a very kid friendly venue.

title: Good food but small portion sizes
text: I came here with my family for lunch. Food was very good and service was friendly. However, you will need to wait for the food and portion sizes are small.

title: Superb
text: Came here for lunch with the family. Staff were super friendly and food tasted amazing. Overall excellent experience.

title: Decent food
text: This review is for Turco Mediterranean which is meant to be more Turkish influenced. Food was decent but service was slow and the restaurant was filled with flies. Overall an ok experience.

title: Great location - average room size
text: I stayed here for 3 nights with my family (2 adults and 2 kids less than 10 years old). Service is excellent and staff are super friendly. However, room sizes are really small and elevator waiting times can be horrendous (2 elevators serving 36 floors). Only benefit of the hotel is the location which is walking distance from Times Square.
place: Holiday Inn New York City - Times Square

title: Kuwait to London Heathrow (roundtrip)
text: The flight from DOH to LHR was an A380 and the return was a 777. I personally prefer the 777 since the Qsuites offer privacy. The lounge in Heathrow was amazing. Qatar Airways has a fine dining section all with ala carte service. Amazing.

title: Good to be back...
text: This is my 3rd time staying at this property and find it to have an excellent location with good quality fixtures and friendly service. It is a boutique property so don't expect any complimentary upgrades. Having said that, I would still return here.

title: Amazing
text: Had steak here and thoroughly enjoyed my dinner. Would highly recommend coming here for dinner whether you are on your own or with friends.

title: Delicious
text: Good lunch here which was fresh and service was quick. Highly recommend this place for a quick bite.

title: Great Kebabs
text: Came here for dinner with friends and was impressed with the quality of kebabs. Food was fresh and delicious.

title: Fresh Sashimi Salad
text: Enjoyed lunch here a couple of times. The salmon and tuna sashimi mixed with greens and their house sauce was delicious.

title: Great leg room disappointed with food
text: The leg room and service are the top points about the Qatar Airways service to Phuket. Disappointed when seats were reallocated due to aircraft switch. The seats themselves are hard which wasn't comfortable for sleeping. Food was disappointing. Small portion sizes and not as filling.

title: Good food bad planes
text: The food was very good however aircraft are old and I was disappointed when I was dropped to the old terminal in Riyadh.

title: Great hotel and service
text: The hotel rooms and service is excellent. The only issue I have is that there isn't much to do nearby. I was upgraded to the club floor which gave me access to the club lounge which had amazing food and soft drinks.
place: Crowne Plaza Riyadh RDC Hotel & Convention Center

title: Fantastic
text: Whenever you want a change from Thai food you should check out the middle eastern cuisine. Well cooked and and tasty selection.

title: Great food and service
text: The food and service here is excellent. They also have halal food options. Must try the Thai food as well as the international cuisine. I had the salad bar selection with steak as well which was great.

title: Loved the Tom Yum
text: First stop for us when we reached Patong. The Tom Yum soup here is absolutely a must try. Great menu selection as well.

title: Great food
text: Food here was amazing and super cheap. Simple place but always good to come and eat here. Must check it out.
place: San Sabai Thai Seafood And BBQ

title: Well maintained
text: This mall has been well maintained after all these years. New restaurants and things to do. Definitely need to check it out.

title: Happening place
text: If you want to be in the midst of all the action and activities then you should check out Patong. We once did the mistake of saying outside of Patong and were bored.

title: Love this place...
text: We always stay at this hotel whenever we visit. Great service and lovely atmosphere. I'm happy to report that the Busakorn Wing is finally getting a much awaited renovation which is scheduled from August 2019 for approx 3 months. Definitely check out the new rooms they will be amazing and modernized.

title: Huge temple
text: Came here with the family as part of a day trip. Huge temple complex with lots to see. Worth checking out.

title: Great food
text: Back here after a year and still enjoyed the food. Great atmosphere and simple setup but the food will definitely please you.

title: Business Class: Doha - JFK - DFW - Doha
text:
Qatar Airways business is by far the best! I recently switched from Emirates due to their poor quality of service. Qatar exceeded all my expectations. Staff were super attentive, they wouldn't stop checking in on you.

Food was amazing and you could eat whenever you wanted to. I love their pajamas and vanity kit and the Qsuite experience was just superb.

title: Pleasantly Surprised
text: I was really pleasantly surprised. The aircraft had a 2 by 2 configuration. Seats were not the best but I was pleased with the quality of service. The flight attendant took good care of us and provided drinks when requested. I would definitely fly them again.

title: Might as well ride a bus
text: To start my originally booked flight was cancelled. Then I got bumped up to a later flight. Boarding was horrendous. The ground staff treated us like cattle waiting to enter when our zone was called. Sitting in the air craft, the seats were cramped up with barely any leg room. Not a very pleasant experience and wouldn't recommend flying with them.
